title: Ep. 75 - A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas (PART 2)
itunes:title: A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas (PART 2)
description:
It's our 75th episode and we're here for the conclusion of A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas! Feyre and Rhysand are working together, spying badly, dry humping in the Court of Nightmares, and FALLING LURVE FOREVER. 
 Bonus Content: Pleasure Barges, Scrotal Wings, IUD's, *Bing Boong Bong* Immortality Bathtubs with Erin, and so much more. 
 Lady Loves: 
 Erin: The Shkoop! A staple of arctic fashion. 
 Melody: Get yourself some clothes that fit. Waiting until you lose that *X* amount of lbs and fit into your pants again just makes you needlessly feel terrible about yourself. Dress the body you've got because it's wonderful and gorgeous and good to you. 
 Check out out PATREON to see all the awesome benefits you can get by supporting us! 
 Patreon Shout Out! 
 Ashley M., you are the Loch Ness Monster. Hear us out. Deep in what appears to be a quiet sea of cubicles, lurks an HB with some serious smut in her headphones. Like Nessie, you are more than happy to submerge with a good book or reality show for a few hundred years, and you only show your scales when absolutely necessary – to stand up for what you believe in, or to protect your beloved home, family, and furbabies. Most of all, like the magical, immortal creature of the Loch, you are absolutely one of a kind.
  
 Want to advertise on the podcast? Email heavingbosomspodcast@gmail.com for our rates! 
Mentioned in this episode:
Preorder Naima Simone X Friends Book Boyfriend Box!!
This box has EVERYTHING you could ever want in a book boyfriend from Tessa Bailey, Avery Flynn, Farrah Rochon, Jayci Lee, Kennedy Ryan, Adriana Herrera, and Naima Simone.
You can look forward to paperbacks, signed book plates, limited edition book boyfriend mugs, the book boyfriend pajamas/loungewear, bookmarks and more!
Tiers include:
- Cinnamon Roll - $114.99
- The Alpha - - $169.99 
Enter the promo code BONKERS10 at checkout to receive $10 off!!! 
ONLY AVAILABLE UNTIL OCT 10, 2022!
If you have any questions, email orders@honeymagnolia.co.
https://heaving-bosoms.captivate.fm/nsbookboyfriends (Naima's Book Boyfriends)

It's our 75th episode and we're here for the conclusion of A Court of Mist and Fury by Sarah J. Maas! Feyre and Rhysand are working together, spying badly, dry humping in the Court of Nightmares, and FALLING LURVE FOREVER. 

Bonus Content: Pleasure Barges, Scrotal Wings, IUD's, *Bing Boong Bong* Immortality Bathtubs with Erin, and so much more. 

Lady Loves: 

Erin: The Shkoop! A staple of arctic fashion. 

Melody: Get yourself some clothes that fit. Waiting until you lose that *X* amount of lbs and fit into your pants again just makes you needlessly feel terrible about yourself. Dress the body you've got because it's wonderful and gorgeous and good to you. 

Check out out PATREON to see all the awesome benefits you can get by supporting us! 

Patreon Shout Out! 

Ashley M., you are the Loch Ness Monster. Hear us out. Deep in what appears to be a quiet sea of cubicles, lurks an HB with some serious smut in her headphones. Like Nessie, you are more than happy to submerge with a good book or reality show for a few hundred years, and you only show your scales when absolutely necessary – to stand up for what you believe in, or to protect your beloved home, family, and furbabies. Most of all, like the magical, immortal creature of the Loch, you are absolutely one of a kind.
